ABOUT
/$
$
/$
/$
$
/$
$
/$
$
WHO WE ARE
​
P
ower and Light Productions of Wauchula, Inc. is located between Bowling Green and
Wauchula, Florida in Hardee County.  The organization, founded in 2001,  is a 501c3 non
-
profit ministry and production company under the direction of Mike and Diane Graham and a volunteer Board of Directors.
WHAT WE DO
​
P&L specializes in spreading the Gospel of Jesus Christ through various theatre styles and custom events.  Dedicated to excellence, our team can work with your organization or church to create a play, show, immersive experience or custom event that will help your organization accomplish its goals.
​
STATEMENT OF FAITH
​
WE BELIEVE that Jesus was born of a virgin, lived among us, died on the cross for our sins, rose from the grave on the third day, and ascended into Heaven. Salvation and eternal life is not earned by human merit but is a free gift for any who will accept it through claiming Jesus Christ as their Lord and Savior. God seeks to carry out his will today through the indwelling gift of his Holy Spirit in the lives of Christians who, together form the church, and together await his second coming and the gift of eternal life in Heaven.
